job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities & Context
Company Overview
YAMAAN is a modern fashion and lifestyle brand focused on premium quality, contemporary design, and delivering an exceptional customer experience. The brand operates through its own retail outlets and online platforms and maintains a strong, professional brand voice in all customer communications.
Job Responsibilities
- Respond to customer messages on Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and website live chat (English only)
- Call customers
- Provide accurate information regarding products, pricing, sizing, availability, and delivery
- Confirm orders and complete the delivery process
- Maintain a polite, professional, and brand-consistent tone in all communications
- Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and follow-ups efficiently
- Coordinate with sales and operations teams when necessary
- Maintain records of customer interactions when required
Skills & Expertise
- Call Center Operations
- Customer Communication
- Fluent Communication in English

Requirements: Educational Requirements
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs Degree (Graduation must be completed)
‚Ä¢ Candidates with an academic background in English or related disciplines will be given preference
Experience Requirements
‚Ä¢ Minimum 1 year of experience
‚Ä¢ Experience in the following business areas will be preferred:
o Call Center
o E-commerce
o F-commerce
Additional Requirements
‚Ä¢ Age between 20 to 30 years
‚Ä¢ Strong expertise in written English is mandatory
‚Ä¢ Minimum English typing speed of 30 WPM
‚Ä¢ Excellent knowledge of English grammar, sentence structure, and professional tone
‚Ä¢ Candidates with IELTS certification or professional English language training will be given priority
‚Ä¢ Fast and accurate typing skills
‚Ä¢ Basic computer knowledge and familiarity with social media platforms
‚Ä¢ Ability to handle multiple customer conversations simultaneously
‚Ä¢ Strong customer service mindset and communication skills
‚Ä¢ Interest in fashion and lifestyle brands will be an added advantage

Responsibilities & Context Company Overview YAMAAN is a modern fashion and lifestyle brand focused on premium quality, contemporary design, and delivering an exceptional customer experience. The brand operates through its own retail outlets and online platforms and maintains a strong, professional brand voice in all customer communications. Job Responsibilities ‚Ä¢ Respond to customer messages on Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and website live chat (English only) ‚Ä¢ Call to customer, ‚Ä¢ Provide accurate information regarding products, pricing, sizing, availability, and delivery ‚Ä¢ Confirm the order and complete the delivery process ‚Ä¢ Maintain a polite, professional, and brand-consistent tone in all communications ‚Ä¢ Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and follow-ups efficiently ‚Ä¢ Coordinate with sales and operations teams when necessary ‚Ä¢ Maintain records of customer interactions when required Skills & Expertise ‚Ä¢ Call Center Operations ‚Ä¢ Customer Communication ‚Ä¢ Fluent Communication i

Responsibilities: YAMAAN is a modern fashion and lifestyle brand based in Dhaka, Bangladesh, known for its clean design language, premium quality, and distinctive concepts. Greet and assist customers in a polite, professional, and welcoming manner.
‚Ä¢ Understand customer requirements and recommend suitable products accordingly.
‚Ä¢ Clearly explain product features including fabric quality, sizing, pricing, and styling.
‚Ä¢ Maintain organized product displays, shelves, racks, and mannequins at all times.
‚Ä¢ Assist with billing, packaging, tagging, and inventory handling when required.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the showroom remains clean, tidy, and visually appealing.
‚Ä¢ Handle customer inquiries and complaints calmly and professionally.
‚Ä¢ Maintain effective communication and teamwork with colleagues.
‚Ä¢ Follow showroom policies including dress code, grooming standards, attendance, and operational guidelines.

Requirements: Working Days: 6 Days in a week. (Thursday, Friday, Saturday Must)
‚Ä¢ Weekly Off: One day off will be provided on the remaining weekdays (Roster base) 
‚Ä¢ Retail Sales & Customer Service 
‚Ä¢ Sales Target Achievement 
‚Ä¢ POS Software operation (Sales, Inventory & Billing) 
‚Ä¢ Strong communication and interpersonal skills 
‚Ä¢ Detail-oriented and efficient task handling 
‚Ä¢ Presentable, confident, and professional appearance 
‚Ä¢ No trace of local accent; clear and neutral communication required 
Additional Requirements: 
‚Ä¢ Experience in shop/showroom-based retail business 
‚Ä¢ Smart, confident, and customer-focused mindset 
‚Ä¢ Ability to work under pressure and in a team environment

YAMAAN is a modern fashion and lifestyle brand based in Dhaka, Bangladesh, known for its clean design language, premium quality, and distinctive concepts. Greet and assist customers in a polite, professional, and welcoming manner. ‚Ä¢ Understand customer requirements and recommend suitable products accordingly. ‚Ä¢ Clearly explain product features including fabric quality, sizing, pricing, and styling. ‚Ä¢ Maintain organized product displays, shelves, racks, and mannequins at all times. ‚Ä¢ Assist with billing, packaging, tagging, and inventory handling when required. ‚Ä¢ Ensure the showroom remains clean, tidy, and visually appealing. ‚Ä¢ Handle customer inquiries and complaints calmly and professionally. ‚Ä¢ Maintain effective communication and teamwork with colleagues. ‚Ä¢ Follow showroom policies including dress code, grooming standards, attendance, and operational guidelines.

company_address: Avenue Road Section:2 , Block: A, Avenue:1 , House: 12/1, Dhaka 1216, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: - Regularly monitor all CCTV cameras and surveillance systems in the outlet.
- Identify irregularities, theft, or suspicious activities in the cash counter, kitchen, store, and delivery area.
- Monitor cash handling, inventory movement, and employee behavior.
- Report any irregularities or security incidents to the relevant authorities immediately.
- Prepare and maintain daily and weekly surveillance reports.
- Review, maintain, and provide CCTV video footage as required.
- Ensure proper adherence to the organization's security policies and SOPs.
- Assist HR and management in investigation-related activities.
- Maintain confidentiality and professional conduct at all times.

Requirements: - University-enrolled students from any reputed private or public university
- Ability to work under pressure
- Good writing skills in both English and Bangla
- Good computer operational knowledge, with good typing speed
- Good observation capability
- Critical thinking and decision making capability
- Ability to work in shifts
- Both males and females can apply
- Applicants residing in Mirpur will get priority

Regularly monitor all CCTV cameras and surveillance systems in the outlet. Identify irregularities, theft, or suspicious activities in the cash counter, kitchen, store, and delivery area. Monitor cash handling, inventory movement and employee behavior. Report any irregularities or security incidents to the relevant authorities immediately. Prepare and maintain daily and weekly surveillance reports. Review, maintain, and provide CCTV video footage as required. Ensure proper adherence to the organization's security policies and SOPs. Assist HR and management in investigation-related activities. Maintain confidentiality and professional conduct at all times.

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities: Confirm website orders Manage courier operations Communicate with new and existing customers to increase sales Explain product features and benefits to customers Work towards achieving sales targets Collect customer feedback and report it for management Build good relationships with customers and resolve any issues

Requirements: Requirements: At least HSC/ Bachelor's degree or equivalent. 1-2 years of work experience in customer care or e-commerce. Both freshers and experienced candidates can apply (experience will be preferred). Must have interest in customer handling and sales. Excellent communication skills and self-confidence are required. Experience in online sales will be given special consideration. Ability to work in a team and under pressure is necessary. Must be quick to learn. Benefits: Career growth and training opportunities. A friendly working environment. Additional benefits. NextWave Solutions Address: Mohammadpur, Dhaka Phone: 01911-055285 (WhatsApp)

company_address: Chawrangi Bhaban,124/A  Elephant Road(6th Floor), Dhaka-1205
job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities: Providing financial assistance to millions of people in the country. Establishing and maintaining relationships with clients to achieve business goals. Benefits: Unlimited earning potential: Commission based on your work. Rapid career progression: Recognition and appreciation based on performance. Opportunity for international travel. Medical coverage: For yourself and your family. Special recognition and provident fund. Scholarship for children. World-class training: To enhance your skills. Flexible work options: Part-time and full-time job opportunities.

Requirements: Contact Us: MetLife Akkas Agency Address: Chourangi Bhavan, Elephant Road, Dhaka If you are ready to take on challenges and want to step into a successful career path, then apply today!
